A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Total disregard to the entire Star Wars franchise.  Please never allow Rian Johnson near Star Wars again. All he cared about was setting up his new trilogy. By doing so he has thrown out 40yrs of mythology.  I really hope Disney/lucasfilms can undo the damage that has been done by this film but I doubt they can salvage it completely. Like the fans have already said\, Luke Skywalker deserved better. The entire franchise deserved better. Don't bother wasting your money to see this in theaters.
